title: Zz'rot portal Shen
body:
One of the problems with Zz'rot Garen is that if your team can't stay out of trouble (ie you lack disengage enemy team has a lot of engage)  you can't push without risking your team dying and losing a bunch of objectives.

So to that end I propose an alternative: Zz'rot Portal Shen.

You can't push as hard as garen but what you have sacrificed in wave clear you make up in crossmap presence. You match garen in sustain (with q) and escape potential (with e) and while it's harder to secure kills you can still push people out of lane and create map pressure. Furthermore it's easier to protect your portal because you have a taunt.

Same build as Garen (Zz'rot, Sunfire, Spirit Visage, Thornmail, Randuins) but I'd recommend taking ignite instead of flash (if you can do so safely) so that it's easier to kill high sustain champions you might find yourself against at various points in the game.

Any thoughts?
